photon.name: Photon
photon.description: Extract custom regex (email, phone number...) from a custom URL

args.description: Alias, absolute or relative path to python 3
Alias, absolute or relative path to the main script of the photon module
The following argument must be the target URL
Number of concurrent call for ressources (increase traffic)
Depth of regex research in found paths (increase traffic and delay)
Empty the arg value "--keys" to stop looking for API keys and hashes
The following argument must be the regex dictionary to research
JSON or CSV, the main script use the json format
The following argument will be the output file name
Hide the end of the leaks on the prompt
